text: Soni Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaakutandisyaga gumba iwumbe kaneka ni tachiiwusyawusya (kuigumba panyuma pakuwa) soni yalakweyo (yakuiwusyawusyayo) ni yaili yakwepepala nnope Kukwakwe, soni Jwalakwe jukwete lumbili lwapenani nnope kumawunde ni petaka (kwanti pangali chakunnandanyichisya nacho), soni Jwalakwe ni Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
